alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:12AM EST until January 11 at 1:45PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour and Hazleton, and the White River at Petersburg. .Rainfall of 1.00 to 1.50 inches across southwestern Indiana this past Saturday night will maintain minor flooding on the White River from near Petersburg to the White River. Flooding is expected to continue through next weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Significant agricultural lands begins to flood. High water affects some local roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM EST Monday was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 6.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1015 PM CST /1115 PM EST/.
